bio:
I am Pooja lived in India. I have done my post-graduation in commerce. I have completed my computer training from reputed computer instruction C-DACC (Centre for Development of Advanced Computing). In 2007, I have worked in a leading BPO company in my city. I have worked in company as a Web operator  and Customer Service. I have worked five years in various projects like Web Research, Data Entry, Customer Service , Scraping/ Data Mining, Virtual Assistance, Healthcare Billing.

I am Accurate, fast keying skills and sound knowledge of computer applications. Proven ability to collect and manage information efficiently and accurately. I have excellent written and verbal communication skills and a strong desire to work hard and perform well.

I am skilled in planning and organizing with the ability to complete tasks on deadline. I am an independent worker who successfully met the challenges of a fast-paced environment providing data entry and administrative support to a large department. I have sound knowledge of database management tools and data entry technologies.

I am a dedicated worker and client's satisfaction is my reward. I know the responsibility of work and it's time value. 

 I have recently started my own individual work. My aim is only one “Clients satisfaction is my reward”. I will assure you that I will serve you best of all. 

 So, let’s start a new journey together as a good friend. Take care yourself and beloved ones and have a nice day.
24 hours, PayPal

abstrac: Tecnología Ambiental y Consultoría engaged to the world environment and people
bio:
Tecnología Ambiental y Consultoría is a company dedicated to providing specialized services to industry in the environmental and technical fields.
in Central America we are pioneers in design, construction and installation of equipment dust collector ( baghouse , cyclone , chambers of gravity, etc.) specializing in baghouse .
Founded in 2005 by Cesar Tomasino, visionary engineer who realized in those years, it was necessary and appropriate to establish a company in Central America to offer advanced technological solutions to the problems that were presented in the environmental and technical fields, with the same features offered by the global companies but at substantially lower costs.
The company installs in El Salvador, vibrant country, recognized worldwide for the hard work of its people, the quality of its skilled workforce and leadership achieved in the field of environmental management in the region.

working hours 8.am to 5 pm Monday through Friday
service payment: bank transfer
communication: e-mail, skipe, phone, website

abstrac: Delivery quality web, mobile and cloud solutions
bio: We are a IT Consulting company that believes in delivering high quality business solutions to our clients across the globe. We work on a hybrid model of delivery with onshore architects and offshore development and quality control teams. This model is beneficial to our clients as it is economical and also provides 100% transparency and insight into the project progress. We follow agile methodology in development and we host our project management and development environments on cloud so that our clients have full access into what we do, how we do. We are here with high energy and enthusiasm to deliver quality products and we only believe in partnering with our clients with a motto of long term fruitful relationship.
please contact us at ramana@ncompasbusiness.com for an immediate response.
